scripts.holder: sed -i .back "s/klg-koa-starter-kit/{{name}}/g; s/考拉后端项目模板/{{description}}/g" boilerplate/package.json boilerplate/README.md
scripts.clean: rm -rf boilerplate/.idea boilerplate/logs boilerplate/node_modules boilerplate/run boilerplate/*.back
scripts.pretest: npm run holder && npm run build && npm run build && npm run install-deps
